desc: 각지에서 입수가능한 녹색을 띈 거대 괴수의 발톱 화석

dictionary.lore: This is a fundamental material easily obtained throughout Elgaia. Apprentice blacksmiths start their training with them. Since many Green Claws are required even when making difficult weapons, a smith can never have enough of them. It's said that all weapons come from the Green Claw.

name: 녹괴의 발톱
